mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_admin JOIN tb_admin_role ON tb_admin_role.admin_id=tb_admin.admin_id JOIN tb_role on tb_role.role_id=tb_admin_role.role_id WHERE tb_admin.admin_id=#{adminid}
